description: The VIA Information Technology (IT) department would like to select a Service Provider to perform a technological upgrade of Oracle EBS (part of the Oracle Enterprise Resource Planner suite) to the latest version on premise. Bidding and Documents are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; See https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) negotiation
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) negotiation
CETA Canada link dozens of businesses to global customers
full_summary:
[Oracle EBS Upgrade Tender Announcement]
=====================================================

**Title**: Oracle EBS Upgrade

**Reference Number**: MX-43003135941
**Solicitation Number**: 202401007
**Publication Date**: January 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: February 28, 2024

VIA Rail Canada Inc. invites eligible bidders to participate in the technological upgrade of Oracle EBS (Enterprise Resource Planning) on premise.

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The VIA IT department seeks a Service Provider to perform a technological upgrade of Oracle EBS to the latest version. The upgrade will improve the efficiency and effectiveness of VIA's business processes.

**Tender Information**
--------------------

* **Notice Type**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract will be subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* **Reporting Date**: February 28, 2024
* **Contracting Entity Name**: VIA Rail Canada Inc.
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Gina Siviero
	+ Email: [gina_siviero@viarail.ca](mailto:gina_siviero@viarail.ca)
	+ Phone: 514-871-6536

**Bidding and Documents**
-------------------------

Bidding documents are available on the MERX website (http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; please refer to the MERX pricing page (https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

Note: This is a rewritten version of the original text, formatted in a more professional manner. The content has been condensed to include only relevant information, while ensuring that no essential details have been excluded. The rewritten entry includes a title, reference number, and solicitation number, as well as a brief overview of the project. The notice type, procurement category, trade agreements, reporting date, and contracting entity information have been included for clarity. The bidding and documents section has been revised to provide clear instructions on where to find the documents and any applicable fees.
